metadata.title: CVE-2020-27674 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.14.x allowing x86 PV guest OSusers to gain guest OS privileges by modifying kernel memory contents,because invalidation of TLB entries is mishandled during use of anINVLPG-like attack technique.

criterions.comment: xen package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
